title: Seeing the Qur’an burning in a dream

preview.html: The Qur’an is burned in a dream on various occasions. The Qur’an is the book of God Almighty that was revealed to His chosen prophet in order to guide the believers and warn the unbelievers from the punishment of God Almighty. Fire, then, to see that the Qur’an is burning in a dream is of course an unpleasant vision, as it portends many bad things that may befall the dreamer, so Encyclopedia presents to you in today’s article the interpretation of the Qur’an burning in a dream in some detail. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an burning in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The translator Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer who finds in a dream that he is burning a copy of the Qur’an, then he will be afflicted with his religion, corrupt his faith, and drown in a sea of ​​sins and misdeeds, straying from the path of truth and righteousness. In the case of the dreamer who eats a leaf of the Qur’an in his mouth, this is a sign. If he is deprived of money or falls into sin, this may be an indication that the dreamer is earning money from writing the Holy Qur’an. The scholar Ibn Sirin points out that seeing the burning of the Qur’an has many meanings and connotations, such as seeing the Qur’an being burned without the intervention of the Messenger, from seeing the Prophet burning the Qur’an with his hand. Like the Qur’an in a dream, it is a sign of the strength of faith that the dreamer has. And how strong his heart is. Therefore, burning the Book of God in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s religion being corrupted in reality. Ibn Sirin claims that the Qur’an in a dream can be a symbol of the ruler, head of state, or holder of authority, and therefore burning the Qur’an in a dream is a sign of the actions committed by the dreamer. It leads to the killing of the king or the person in authority, but if the Holy Qur’an is burned without the dreamer’s intervention, this is a sign of the death of the ruler in reality without the dreamer’s opinion about it. If the fortuneteller finds that there is someone working to burn the Qur’an in the dream, this is evidence of the corruption of this person and the loss of his religion in reality. And following his desires and falling into sins. It indicates that the king or ruler will be betrayed or confronted by the enemy and killed. Interpretation of seeing evil in the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin believes that if the dreamer receives the Holy Qur’an in a dream, this is an indication that he will lose his knowledge or it may be a sign that his work will stop. Ibn Sirin adds that what a believer hates to happen to the Qur’an in reality, if it happens in a dream, is a sign of the destruction of religion, faith and belief, and stealing the Holy Qur’an in a dream is evidence. For the dreamer, he will neglect to complete the prayer or abandon it. If the dreamer finds that he is cutting up the leaves of the Qur’an, scattering them, and distributing them to people, then this is good news for him, as he will seek knowledge and wisdom and acquire money through inheritance, God willing. Placing the Qur’an on the dreamer’s lap and the presence of chickens, which take his words as an indication that the dreamer will have a child. The Holy Qur’an on the teachings of Islam and following its path. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an burning in the bathroom in a dream: If the dreamer finds that the Qur’an and the words of God are burning in the bathroom or in the bathroom, God forbid, then this vision does not bode well, as it indicates that the dreamer is a person who neglected the forbidden. He left the Qur’an and no longer cared to read it. Seeing the Qur’an in the toilet in a dream may be a sign of the dreamer’s neglect and failure to learn from the Qur’an.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, a detailed explanation

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi is a detailed explanation, because cockroaches are insects that cause fear in many people, especially girls, and they are also insects that cause a feeling of disgust, but this is reflected in the connotations and signs that this vision carries on the one hand, and on the other hand, With reference to what is mentioned in dream interpretation books, we find that seeing cockroaches in a dream has many connotations, and in this article we will discuss them in detail so that researchers searching for the interpretation of a dream about cockroaches in a dream can be answered by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in a detailed explanation. Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches in a dream. Cockroaches refer to Enemies in a dream. They are said to represent a genie, an envious person, or a foolish and unlovable person. Basically, cockroaches are unlikable creatures. Their appearance may indicate: Evil words indicate envy and hatred. It indicates many problems. It indicates your enemies close to you. It also indicates poverty and illness. Interpretation of seeing cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Cockroaches indicate the presence of many enemies, and cockroaches in a dream indicate The presence of hypocrites around you and warning you of them, also indicates problems. The appearance of cockroaches in a dream indicates that someone is reminding you of something bad in front of people. Seeing dead cockroaches in a dream means that people in your life are trying to prevent you from reaching your goal. A cockroach attack in a dream means the appearance Many problems and crises. Killing cockroaches in a dream and getting rid of them shows signs of success and perseverance against enemies. The appearance of cockroaches also indicates envy and the evil eye. When a person sees in a dream that he is catching cockroaches with his hands without harm, this indicates the formation of bad friends who will cause many problems, then You correct it and return to normal again. Interpretation of eating cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin narrates: When a person dreams that he is eating cockroaches, he will fall into great trouble, or that person may contract a disease, and God knows best. If the dreamer’s job is trade, and he saw it in his dream That he eats cockroaches, this indicates that he will suffer a great financial loss. When one sees in his dream that he is eating cockroaches, this means that he has no morals. When one sees in his dream that he is eating cockroaches, this means that that person knows the extent of the misfortune he has fallen into and is trying Get rid of them or retreat from them and stay away from them. Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches in the house When a person sees in a dream a large group of cockroaches in his bed, this indicates: There are many problems that will happen to him. Or he suffers from a problem in his job and leaves it. It is possible to see cockroaches in The house is positive when the dreamer gets rid of them and makes them disappear. When one sees cockroaches scattered on every side of the house, this may indicate one of the signs of the large number of hypocrites around him, so one must be careful. title: Shaving the beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: What you do not know about shaving your beard in a dream: Seeing yourself shaving your beard in a dream is one of the things that many people are exposed to, and it can have many indications and interpretations, which vary between good and evil, and its interpretations can vary depending on the situation of the viewer and also depending on the situation in which It was stated in it, and through this article we will learn about the best interpretations that have arisen regarding this vision. Interpretation of shaving the beard in a dream by Ibn Sirin: It is considered one of the visions that indicate money and great wealth that the dreamer enjoys, as it indicates its decrease or increase, depending on the state of the vision itself. When the dreamer is in a dream and shaves it completely, it is a sign for him of a lack of money or livelihood, and an indication that he will be exposed to poverty in the coming period, and God knows best. Cutting the beard in a dream. If one is single and sees in his dream that he is thinning it, then in reality it is a sign of marriage, and evidence that he will have a woman with high morals, especially if he shaves his mustache with her. If he sees that he has shaved only half of his beard, this means that he will be poor. In reality, it is a want, a need, and a lack of his money. If he holds a high position and power, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will lose his position or that he will leave the position and prestige that he enjoyed among the people before, and God - the Most High - is higher and knows best. To reach For the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of shaving the beard in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. The great scholar Al-Nabulsi also saw shaving the beard as one of the matters that indicates the loss of money, power, jobs, and other worldly pleasures. Also, if A person sees that he will shave it for another person, then this indicates that he will be deceived and deceived by that person. Shaving the beard in a dreamAnd also if he sees it in a dream, and the one who sees it has a lot of debts in his real life, this means that he will pay off all his debts in his future life and get rid of All his money. Problems and his situation will be restored. But if he cuts his beard in a dream and feels happy about it, and his face looks young or signs of beauty appear after shaving it, this indicates that God will bless him with a child soon. On the other hand, if he feels that his appearance has become worse than others , and after that he felt sad and sad, so this is a sign that he will be sad and sad, and perhaps give up the worship that he was performing. God is Most High and He knows best. Sources: 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- The Dictionary of the Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. 3 - The book “Perfuming the Dreams” as an Expression of a Dream by Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. 4- The Book of Signs in the World of Expressions, Al-Imam Al-Mubarak, Ghars Al-Din Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Zahiri, researched by Sayyed Kasrawi Hassan, Dar Al-Kutub Al-Ilmiyyah, Beirut 1993.

Interpretation of the dream of eggs by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen interpreted the vision of eggs in a dream as a sign of nine meanings, which are that the dreamer obtains a mortgage, and an indication of requesting a need, as well as obtaining a new job. Whoever sees more than four eggs in his dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will get a lot of money. Whoever eats cooked eggs in his sleep, this dream is an indication that the dreamer will get some money after toil and exhaustion.
